item.title: Android 2.2 live@edu
item.dc:creator: Suzanne
item.description: Email Add Account enter kent email address enter kent password manual setup Exchange account username@kent.ac.uk exchange server is – podxxxx.outlook.com (sign into live@edu click on Help/About to confirm your server) use SSL Accept all SSLCertificates Next Ok to Remote Security Administration warning Edit the Account Options if you wish Next Name account Live@edu Done Activate [...]
item.content:encoded:
Email
Add Account
enter kent email address
enter kent password
manual setup
Exchange account
username@kent.ac.uk
exchange server is – podxxxx.outlook.com (sign into live@edu click on Help/About to confirm your server)
use SSL
Accept all SSLCertificates
Next
Ok to Remote Security Administration warning
Edit the Account Options if you wish
Next
Name account Live@edu
Done
Activate Device Administrator (makes your email account more secure in the event your device is stolen)

Report post

item.title: Android 2.2 ConnectMail
item.dc:creator: Suzanne
item.description: Email enter kent email address enter kent password manual setup Exchange account ukc\username exchange server is – sync.connect.kent.ac.uk use SSL Accept all SSL Certificates Next Ok to Remote Security Administration warning Edit the Account Options if you wish Next Name account ConnectMail Done Activate Device Administrator (makes your email account more secure in the event [...]
item.content:encoded:
Email
enter kent email address
enter kent password
manual setup
Exchange account
ukc\username
exchange server is – sync.connect.kent.ac.uk
use SSL
Accept all SSL Certificates
Next
Ok to
Remote Security Administration warning
Edit the Account Options if you wish
Next
Name account ConnectMail
Done
Activate Device Administrator (makes your email account more secure in the
event your device is stolen)

Report post

item.title: Android 2.2 Wifi
item.dc:creator: Suzanne
item.description: From the home screen on your device go to .. Applications Settings Wireless and Network Wi-Fi Settings Turn on Wi-Fi Scan for networks eduroam eap method – Peap Phase2 authentication – MSChapV2 CA Certificate – Unspecified User Certificate – Unspecified Identity - yourkentusername@kent.ac.uk Anonymous idenity – (leave blank) Password – enter your kent password Connect Report [...]
item.content:encoded:
From the home screen on your device go to ..
Applications
Settings
Wireless and Network
Wi-Fi Settings
Turn on Wi-Fi
Scan for networks
eduroam
eap method – Peap
Phase2 authentication – MSChapV2
CA Certificate – Unspecified
User Certificate – Unspecified
Identity - yourkentusername@kent.ac.uk
Anonymous idenity – (leave blank)
Password – enter your kent password
Connect

Report post
